name: Wave of Vikings - GGJ 2017
description:
Short mini-game made for Global Game Jam 2017, about Waves!

We may plan on develop a full version for mobile with this idea, so enjoy our prototype in the meantime!

Game made by:

Arthur Vasconcelos (Sound - not authoral)

Érica Reis (Art)

Matheus Lima (game programming)

Robson dos Santos (Art)

We are students from the Game Design Degree of FACISA, Campina Grande - PB / Brazil.

FULLSCREEN IS RECOMMENDED.
